channel.title: "désir" Remix Challenge ( oh, no. another piano track ) (UPDATE: discontinued because of hiatus)
channel.description:
Since I've been asked to do this by multiple people - here it is:
_**The "désir" remix challenge.**_
Feel free to change it to any key, tempo, swing amount, or genre. _This time you're **only** allowed to have **piano in the intro**._ I can't wait to hear what you all with do with this.
All of the remixes should be in by **December 20th.**
![désir (3)|500x500](upload://2B74JzdTtDNKwKFK9DSbthZsjGi.jpg)
**The rules** ( the same as in the last one )
* Title it _**HAYVN - désir (your name remix)**_ * Use the cover art provided or a picture of a solar eclipse and feel free to add your logo to it * Be as creative as you can be and have fun with it!
And again if you want to get a better feeling for the song, then here is the original: https://soundcloud.com/hayvn/desir
For the impatient ones who just want to get started: https://app.auxy.co/projects/8UHiMmhePeaz2KAQafr4UQ==
Project file without AP-001: https://app.auxy.co/projects/8bcCy4R7_LY6O7-k8UMWeg==
I hope you all enjoy this one as much as the last one. Have fun remixing and experimenting! :relaxed:

item.description:

item.title: "désir" Remix Challenge ( oh, no. another piano track ) (UPDATE: discontinued because of hiatus)
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Damn well done!! You’ve got this Mum / Sigur Ros thing going on and I’m 100% feeling it. Love how the very low volume drums in the background provide pacing/texture.

Effin awesome. Awesome strings too
